quiz.name: African Cities Quiz
quiz.intro: This is a quiz about cities in africa

questions.title: African cities: Question 1
questions.description: Which of the following cities is in Sudan?
questions.explanation: Khartoum is a city in Sudan, Kassala is a city in Sudan

answers.explanation: Khartoum is a city in Sudan
Cairo is not a city in Sudan
Kassala is a city in Sudan

questions.title: African cities: Question 2
questions.description: What is the Capital of Kenya?

answers.explanation: Omdurman is not the capital of Kenya
Kisumu is not the capital of Kenya
Nairobi is the capital of Kenya

questions.title: African cities: Question 3
questions.explanation: Lagos is a city in Nigeria

answers.explanation: Lagos is a city in Nigeria
Lagos is a city in Nigeria
